Description: Point of sale for iPad, Mac and PC.
Name: Vend

Methods.Name: List Customers
Methods.Description: List customers.

Methods.Name: Get Customer
Methods.Description: Get a single customer by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Customers
Methods.Description: List new customers since last run.

Methods.Name: Update Customer
Methods.Description: Updates an existing customer.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer
Methods.Description: Delete a customer.

Methods.Name: Get Customers By Customer Code
Methods.Description: Gets customers with a specified Customer Code.

Methods.Name: Create Customer
Methods.Description: Creates a new customer.

Methods.Name: List Sales
Methods.Description: List sales.

Methods.Name: Get Sale
Methods.Description: Get a single sale by ID.

Methods.Name: List New Sales
Methods.Description: List new sales since last run.

Methods.Name: List Customer Groups
Methods.Description: List customer groups.

Methods.Name: Get Customer Group
Methods.Description: Get a single customer group by ID.

Methods.Name: Update Customer Group
Methods.Description: Updates an existing customer group.

Methods.Name: Delete Customer Group
Methods.Description: Get a single customer group by ID.

Methods.Name: List Customer Group Members
Methods.Description: Returns a list of Customers for the given Customer Group.

Methods.Name: Add Customers to Group
Methods.Description: Associates one or more Customers with the given Customer Group

Methods.Name: Remove Customers from Group
Methods.Description: Deletes the given Customers from the Customer Group.

Methods.Name: Create Customer Group
Methods.Description: Creates a new customer group.

Methods.Name: List Products
Methods.Description: Returns a paginated list of products.

Methods.Name: Get Product
Methods.Description: Returns a single product object with a given ID.

Methods.Name: Get Inventory Data
Methods.Description: Returns inventory data for a single product in all the outlets.

Methods.Name: Get Product Price Books
Methods.Description: This end point returns the list of Price Books the given product is in.

Methods.Name: Upload Product Image
Methods.Description: Upload a binary file with an image to be used for a product. This request should be encoded as multipart/form-data.

Methods.Name: List Updated Products
Methods.Description: Returns a paginated list of products updated since last cycle.

Methods.Name: List Product Types
Methods.Description: Returns a paginated list of product types.

Methods.Name: Get Product Type
Methods.Description: Returns a single product type with a given ID.

Methods.Name: Get Product Image Data
Methods.Description: Returns the metadata for a single product image with a given ID. This method is useful for checking the status of an image after it was uploaded.

Methods.Name: Set Image Position
Methods.Description: Allows for changing the image position in the list.

Methods.Name: Delete Product Image
Methods.Description: Deletes the product_image with the requested ID.

Methods.Name: List Outlets
Methods.Description: Returns a collection of outlets.

Methods.Name: Get Outlet
Methods.Description: Returns a single outlet with the requested ID.

Methods.Name: List Registers
Methods.Description: Retrieves all registers.

Methods.Name: List Users
Methods.Description: Retrieves all users.

Methods.Name: List Taxes
Methods.Description: Retrieves all taxes.

Methods.Name: List Payment Types
Methods.Description: Retrieves all payment types.

Methods.Name: Get Retailer
Methods.Description: Retrieves information about the retailer associated with the authenticated user/application.

Methods.Name: Create Register Sale
Methods.Description: Create a register sale object.
